      • generateCSV

        public void generateCSV(au.com.bytecode.opencsv.CSVWriter writer,
               java.util.Set<Card> cards,
               java.util.Set<Contract> contracts,
               java.util.Calendar begin,
               java.util.Calendar end)
        generate the CSV with the game summary. For that it uses opencsv
        Parameters:
        writer - this is the CSVWriter for the export
        cards - the card set filled after load
        contracts - set of contracts filled in the game
        begin - Time when the game began saved in kms.configuration
        end - Time when the game end saved in kms.configuration
